name: Matcha Green Tea
description: Premium Japanese matcha powder, rich in antioxidants and perfect for lattes or traditional tea ceremonies.

name: Sencha Green Tea
description: Classic Japanese green tea with a fresh, grassy flavor and vibrant aroma.

name: Thai Green Tea
description: Aromatic green tea from Thailand, smooth and refreshing with a delicate flavor.

name: Li Tiao Tea
description: Traditional Chinese black tea blend with a bold, malty flavor and smooth finish. Perfect for morning or afternoon enjoyment.

name: Oolong Tea
description: Traditional Chinese semi-oxidized tea with floral and fruity notes.
